articles.description: Follow text updates and listen to live commentary as Manchester United host Arsenal in the Women's Super League.
articles.title: WSL: Man Utd v Arsenal - team news & build-up

articles.description: Follow radio and text commentary as hosts France play Italy for a place in the Rugby World Cup quarter-finals.
articles.title: Rugby World Cup: France v Italy for quarter-final place - radio & text

articles.description: Follow radio and text coverage of Catalans v St Helens in the Super League play-off Semi Finals at Stade Gilbert Brutus.
articles.title: Super League play-off semi-final: Catalans v St Helens - radio & text

articles.description: Max Verstappen storms to pole position at the Qatar Grand Prix and needed only one run in the final qualifying session to do it.
articles.title: Verstappen on pole in Qatar as title looms

articles.description: Juventus midfielder Paul Pogba's failed drugs test is confirmed after his B sample also tests positive.
articles.title: Pogba's B sample confirms positive drugs test

articles.description: Watch live coverage of Great Britain's Ondine Achampong and Alice Kinsella and Simone Biles in the women's all-around final at the World Gymnastics Championships 2023 in Antwerp, Belgium.
articles.title: Watch: World Gymnastics Championships - GB's Kinsella & Achampong in all-around final

articles.description: A mix-up between Pakistan batters Mohammad Nawaz and Shaheen Afridi results in a run out against Netherlands in the Cricket World Cup clash at Hyderabad.
articles.title: 'What a comedy of errors!' - Nawaz run out by Ackermann

articles.description: Bas de Leede's impressive all-round efforts are in vain as Pakistan beat Netherlands by 81 runs in the World Cup.
articles.title: Pakistan beat spirited Netherlands in World Cup

articles.description: Ireland are nowhere near being invincible and won't let complacency creep into their game against Scotland, insists James Lowe.
articles.title: 'Complacency not an issue as Ireland gear up for Scots'
